en-us.learning_promise:
This unit introduces your students to computational thinking. They'll begin to understand what a sequence is, be able to follow instructions to create a sequence, and describe the sequence to their peers. They'll learn how to break problems down into smaller parts, identify cause and effect, and understand simple loops. Finally, they'll explore the process of testing and debugging programs to ensure that their programs work as intended.

Your students find ways of helping the main characters, and practice recounting an experience using relevant details. This will help to develop their collaborative conversation skills.

lessons.lesson_description: Maria and Sofie are going on a boat trip! How will they get their boat into the water?
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Maria and Sofie are going on a boat trip! How will they get their boat into the water?

text.content: Maria and Sofie are going on a boat trip!
Sofie wonders how the boat will get into the water.
Build the robot. It pushes the boat into the water.
Here’s your challenge. Make the program. It pushes the boat into the water.
Make the program. It pushes the boat into the water.

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 1 Boat Trip

lessons.lesson_description: Leo is going on an Arctic adventure to see polar bears. How can he use his snowmobile to get there?
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Leo is going on an Arctic adventure to see polar bears. How can he use his snowmobile to get there?

text.content: Leo likes polar bears.
Leo wants to see where the polar bears live.
Build the snowmobile. It'll help Leo visit the polar bears.
Here's your challenge. Make the program. It makes the snowmobile go.
Make the program. It makes the snowmobile go.

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 2 Arctic Ride

lessons.lesson_description: Daniel wonders what lives inside a dark cave. What do you think is hiding in the dark?
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Daniel wonders what lives inside a dark cave. What do you think is hiding in the dark?

text.content: Daniel finds a dark cave.
Daniel wants to know what's in the cave. It's too dark to see inside.
Build the cave car. It'll help light up the cave.
Here's your challenge. Make the program. It turns on the cave car's light.
Make the program. It turns on the cave car’s light.

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 3 Cave Car

lessons.lesson_description: Leo doesn't want to miss any of the animals walking by his campsite while he's asleep. How can his animal alarm help him?
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Leo doesn't want to miss any of the animals walking by his campsite while he's asleep. How can his animal alarm help him?

text.content: Leo is sleepy. It's time to go to bed.
But Leo is curious. He wants to see all the creatures that walk by his camp at night.
Build an animal alarm. It'll turn on when a blue creature walks by the Color Sensor.
Here's your challenge. Make the program. It turns the alarm on when a blue creature walks by the Color Sensor.
Make the program. It makes the alarm turn on when a blue creature walks by the Color Sensor.

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 4 Animal Alarm

lessons.lesson_description: Maria is curious to explore life below the sea. How can she get the submarine in and out of the water?
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Maria is curious to explore life below the sea. How can she get the submarine in and out of the water?

text.content: Maria is at the beach. She sees a turtle go into the water.
Maria wants to visit the turtle under the water.
Build a submarine. Maria can use it to visit the turtle.
Here's your challenge. Make the program. It moves the submarine.
Make the program. It moves the submarine.

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 5 Underwater Quest

lessons.lesson_description: Sofie is looking forward to seeing the moon from her treehouse! How can she open the treehouse roof for a great view of the sky?
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Sofie is looking forward to seeing the moon from her treehouse! How can she open the treehouse roof for a great view of the sky?

text.content: Sofie is sleeping outside for the first time.
She wants to see the moon from her treehouse.
Build the treehouse so Sofie can see the moon.
Here's your challenge. Make the program. It opens the treehouse roof.
Make the program. It opens the treehouse roof.

- LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Essential Set
- Device with the LEGO® Education SPIKE™ App installed

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 6 Treehouse Camp

lessons.lesson_description: It’s time for another great adventure. Help the team reach the pyramids!
lessons.lesson_sub_title: It’s time for another great adventure. Help the team reach the pyramids!

text.content: The team is ready for a desert adventure!
They wonder how they'll get to the pyramids.
Imagine how they'll get there.
Here's your challenge. Create a way for the team to get to the pyramids. Use at least one motor or sensor.
Here's your challenge. Create a way for the team to get to the pyramids. Use at least one motor or sensor.

teacher_support.things_you_will_need:
(one for every two students)

- LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Essential Set
- Device with the LEGO® Education SPIKE™ App installed
- OPTIONAL: Additional materials for brainstorming (e.g., notebook paper, science notebook, etc.)

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 7 The Great Desert Adventure

en-us.title: SPIKE Essential Great Adventures
en-us.unit_plan_description: Join Maria, Sofie, Leo, and Daniel on their great adventure. Help build and program new experiences for the team as they explore and play.
